title: How to buy a champ
body: I've just updated my LoL client and i cant buy champions,it says:"not yet implemented",why?

replies.body:
That's really odd, the store is currently active on the updated client.  If the issue persists after a restart or relog, then there may be a corruption with your update that may require a [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  You can also test the old store by returning to the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hopefully that will fix the issue!

You can only buy champs through the store right now.
We can assume the ability to buy them through the profile will be added in a later patch.
What do u mean through the store ?

Go to store---> champions and you can buy champs on the new client.
Through the profile doesn't work yet.
